title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.82 - Labeling requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.82 - Labeling requirements

State Regulations

Each container of waste must be clearly labeled to
identify whether it is Class A waste, Class B waste or Class C waste, as
determined in accordance with section
382.80
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
382.82

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
